sense.gloss: to change, to swap, to substitute, to transfer
to change the object of one's interest or focus
to permeate something with the smell or colour of something
to move on to the next or different stage of (a plan, etc.)
to change the target of interest or concern
to be permeated by a colour or scent
to be infected, to be contagious, to spread (as in fire)
demotion, relegation, reduction in rank, degradation, downward move
relocation of the capital, transfer of the capital
installation of a deity in a new shrine, transfer of a shrine
relocation of a shrine, transfer of an object of worship

sdata.j: ↑表面↑↓ひょうめん↓↑上↑↓じょう↓、↑本書↑↓ほんしょ↓の↑大↑↓だい↓↑部分↑↓ぶぶん↓は↑一連↑↓いちれん↓の↑事例↑↓じれい↓の↑変遷↑↓へんせん↓を↑記録↑↓きろく↓したものである。
sdata.e: On the surface the book consists mostly of a series of case histories.

sdata.j: ↑孟母三遷↑↓もうぼさんせん↓の↑教↑↓おし↓えなど↑持↑↓も↓ち↑出↑↓だ↓して、↑子供↑↓こども↓のお↑受験↑↓じゅけん↓での↑引↑↓ひ↓っ↑越↑↓こ↓しを↑正当↑↓せいとう↓↑化↑↓か↓しないでよ。
sdata.e: Don't drag out Chinese sayings about the importance of an environment conducive learning just to justify moving house for a child's entrance exams!

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑部長↑↓ぶちょう↓の↑娘↑↓むすめ↓さんを↑妊娠↑↓にんしん↓させて、↑左遷↑↓させん↓されました。
sdata.e: He got the section chief's daughter pregnant and was demoted.

words.gloss: to change, to swap, to substitute, to transfer
